# GumGum

## Example

### Slot Ad

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="100"
  type="gumgum"
  data-zone="ggumtest"
  data-slot="3883"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For parameters, configuration or any questions, contact [GumGum](http://gumgum.com/contact/).

### Required parameters

-   `data-zone`: GumGum Zone ID
-   `data-slot`: GumGum Slot Ad ID
